xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 9 Dassanenapahātabbattika » 9.3 Paccayavāra » 9.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 9.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Dassanenapahātabbattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
45.
885Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
886Anulomaṃ.
